name: Muhit
review: The shorts ripped (crotch seam) during the second wear. It was a super cute outfit and the shirt seems to be wearing just fine.

name: musfikur rahim
review: Bought the 6-12 month for my 7 month old boy and it fits him perfectly, probably going to size up and get him another set.

name: saddam hossain
review: SUPER CUTE! The shirt is the right size, but the waistband in the shorts make the shorts tight.

name: shanto
review: Cutest little darn outfit! Fits well and looks like a summer dream.

name: ibrahim khalil
review: Soft and perfect. The quality of the clothing is better than the rest of my kiddos wardrobe!

name: abdul kader
review: Look and fit was great for our grandson
